apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to add an add to cart event for the calling user
operations.notes:
Web service to add an add to cart event for the calling user. This will add
to a cookie only.

The returns is a JSON representation of the cart items.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to add a purchase for the calling user. This wil
operations.notes:
Web service to add a purchase for the calling user. This will add the
purchase to a cookie (used to simulate purchases).

The returns is a JSON representation of the added purchase.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to add a searched for term for the calling user.
operations.notes:
Web service to add a searched for term for the calling user.

The returns is a JSON representation of the current cookies.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to add a view for the calling user. This will ad
operations.notes:
Web service to add a view for the calling user. This will add the view to
the cookie (used for personalization) as well as add it to the model (if
it can). TODO: Add the view to the model if we want to do that. Right now
this is cookie only.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to clear add to cart events for the calling user
operations.notes:
Web service to clear add to cart events for the calling user. This will affect the cookie value.

The returns is a JSON representation of the current cookies.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service to clear purchases for the calling user. This wi
operations.notes:
Web service to clear purchases for the calling user. This will clear the
purchase cookie (used to simulate purchases).

The returns is a JSON representation of the current cookies.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to

operations.summary: Web service to clear searched for terms for the calling user
operations.notes:
Web service to clear searched for terms for the calling user.

The returns is a JSON representation of the current cookies.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service that clears the views for a given user.  This cl
operations.notes:
Web service that clears the views for a given user.  This clears all of the
views from the cookies.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary:
Web service that obtains the geo information for the user
an
operations.notes:
Web service that obtains the geo information for the user
and returns it to the caller.

This doesn't do any storage of anything, just looks up the
geo information from the IP address and returns it.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service that fetches the purchases for a given user.  Wi
operations.notes:
Web service that fetches the purchases for a given user.  Without and id, this will just be cookie
values.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service that fetches the views for a given user.  This c
operations.notes:
Web service that fetches the views for a given user.  This consolidates all of the
views from the cookie as well as any persisted views we may have.

apis.description:
A web service API using jersey which exposes the main services necessary to
obtain user data for a given site

operations.summary: Web service that fetches the GUID for a given user.  This ju
operations.notes:
Web service that fetches the GUID for a given user.  This just reads from the cookie
and MD5 hashes the value to make it different from the GUID but derivable from the GUID
